attributes.action: To Allow Children, not teachers to Decide if they wear shoes or not in PE Lessons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is no need for this strange rule that you must do PE with barefeet, its dangerous, and the kids feet are more important the a floor. You can buy a new floor, but if the kid falls, slips, or hurts itself then the School will be at fault.

Human rights and dignaty of the kids at heart and stake here.

Let the kids decide if their wear trainers etc. NOT the teachers!!!

rejection.details: There is no specific prevention of this activity.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
